title: About me
text:
I am an intern at Datacation where I fulfill duties of a Data Science Consultant.
I work with HERAS on predicting the time of components‚Äô failure in their products to prevent disruptions in their services.
I am passionate about predictive models and, since recently, web scraping. You can check out my webscraping project here.
I am in the final year of my Bachelor in Econometrics at the Erasmus University Rotterdam.

title: CV
text: I am a motivated and enthusiastic individual with a strong interest in modelling, quantitative research and data analysis. At present, I am looking for exposure to these sectors to see what the best fit for me is and to choose my future path accordingly.
